transArray.content: Everyone staying is a guest of your hotel. Regardless of which platform you booked on, once you check in, you are your guest. But when I asked for a late check-out, the answer I got was "Because you booked with Ctrip, so you can't delay it". I understand that whether the hotel can delay check-out depends on the number of guests on that day, not the booking platform. There should be no such discrimination.
